items.sentence: I know you\'re busy, but I could use some help.
I assume that you\'ll be eating lunch with Tom.
Who\'s the author of the novel you\'re reading?
Tom said he paid thirty dollars for that shirt.
Tom said he thought Mary was likely to do that.
Tom said he thought Mary was unhappy in Boston.
Tom said he thought Mary would enjoy the movie.
Tom said he thought he had forgotten something.
Tom isn\'t going to have to do that by himself.
Our class is going on a field trip next Monday.
